text_block_list.text:
――Well then, Kris S-san. Will you tell us now? 
Who is it you want to team up with?
text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer A

text_block_list.text:
Today, Symboli Kris S would announce 
the results of the [Trainer Selection]――

Since I wasn't even participating, there was no reason I would be 
selected. However―― now that I knew her, I couldn't help but hope.

Our eyes met. In that moment, 
I couldn't stop the words from spilling out.
You.
text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris S

text_block_list.text: Symboli Kris S' eyes were looking straight at me.

――In this place, you're…… the one that knows me most. 
You tried to―― learn more about me.
text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris S

text_block_list.text:
About me. ――You said, I had results. 
Even if it was only a little…… you said I had them.
text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris S

text_block_list.text:
That's why. ……If it's with you, 
I can do it. ――That's what I feel.
text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris S

text_block_list.text:
It was that sincerity. It was the sincerity that I 
wanted to live up to…… That I had hoped for.
――What do you think?
text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris S
choice_data_list: <size=42>……I look forward to working with you!</size>

text_block_list.text: ――That's why ――I'm sorry.
text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris S

text_block_list.text:
Symboli Kris S lowered her head to them. 
Because she had turned down all the proper candidates!
choice_data_list: I…… I want to be her trainer! Sorry!

text_block_list.text:
Ah, no…… it's fine, it's fine. 
She's the one that decided, so I have no complaints!
text_block_list.name: Mid-Rank Trainer A

text_block_list.text:
That's right…… in the first place, we may not have tried enough 
to meet in the middle. Kris S-san, we apologize as well.
text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer A

text_block_list.text: ――…… I'm grateful.
text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris S

text_block_list.text: ――Several days later.
……Well then―― lastly―― a light cooldown.
text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris S

text_block_list.text:
After talking with Symboli Kris S, I was gradually getting 
accustomed to reducing her training load as much as possible.
Hey, working hard, I see.

Congratulations on becoming her trainer. 
I say that but…… this was well within my expectations.
text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf

text_block_list.text:
I felt you were suited for it. 
Since both of you are a little similar.
text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf

text_block_list.text:
Yeah, without a doubt. 
――Well, Kris S will be back in a little bit.
text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf

text_block_list.text:
I shouldn't bother you, I'll excuse myself here. 
……I'm leaving her to you, Trainer.
text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf

text_block_list.text: ――Several days after that. After training had ended.
……? Why? You…… talk and laugh quite a lot.
text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris S

text_block_list.text:
Certainly not if you looked at words spoken…… Symboli Rudolf had 
said 『You're similar』, and I couldn't help but think about it.

――Not being similar…… is fine. 
I don't―― want to…… be misunderstood.
text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris S

text_block_list.text:
Even if the misunderstanding with the senpai trainers 
was cleared up, many of her Uma Musume classmates 
seemed to still be fearful of her.

――I have you. I have a…… trainer. 
You―― understand a lot about me.
text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris S

text_block_list.text:
――To fulfill my mission…… as long as I have you. 
It's sufficient――it's enough.
text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris S

text_block_list.text:
She's saying that she only needs one person to understand her. 
She wanted to focus on her mission――
choice_data_list: (……I want to help Kris S succeed)

text_block_list.text:
That was also my desire, 
before I realized it, that's what I thought.
I want to become my mentor's results―― is what I thought.
text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris S

text_block_list.text: ……what's wrong?
text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris S
choice_data_list: ……If you want to fulfill your mission.
……If you want to fulfill your mission.

text_block_list.text:
The similarity that Symboli Rudolf mentioned. 
――It was that we both made someone else's dream our own.

――That's where we're similar? 
The same――
text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris S

text_block_list.text:
…… …… 
…………――that's right.
text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris S

text_block_list.text:
Symboli Kris S nodded…… 
the look on her face told me she was convinced.
It's the same.
text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris S

text_block_list.text:
――The two of us, who were so alike, would continue on together. 
With an important dream that we'd carry together.

Even if it hadn't been my dream―― 
that feeling was the truth.
